attributes.action: Change national anthem to Next Hype by Tempa T (aka TEMPZ!)
attributes.additional_details:
Some feel the UK's current national anthem is no longer relevant, we need something that inspires people of all ages in the UK. Why not Next Hype by London's best grime MC, Tempa T?

I think the government should change it to Next Hype

Here is a link to the proposed new anthem http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZ6G7qwjom4
